title: Non Arab has wiswas pronoucing Quran   the more difficult it is to recite it is double the reward
transcript: from uk he says he suffers from during pray reciting the quran you have to ignore this and the more difficult it is for you to pronounce the quran and you struggle with it the double the reward you get in sha allah so ignore this try to focus on doing a good job try to practice after salat and inshallah you'll be doing well
